collections.name: Core/Always-On
collections.description: Always included in all indices. Universal kernel competencies essential for all users.
collections.notes: This collection cannot be modified or deleted. It forms the foundation for all custom selections. Contains only competencies with classification.type='kernel' in their manifests.

metadata.description: Competency collections define groupings of competencies for different personas and use cases
notes: Collections with locked=true cannot be edited or deleted
The 'core' collection is always mandatory and cannot be modified
Kernel competencies are determined by classification.type='kernel' in each competency manifest
Currently kernel competencies: common, prompt-engineer, git-assistant
Internal tools (olaf-specific-tools) are excluded from persona collections
Users can create custom collections by running create_collection.py
Users can select collections by running select_collection.py
Each collection is a named grouping that generates a competency index
